title: Chase
description: Cassidy Arbor thought she knew exactly who she was and where she was headed, until her controlling fiancé began to dictate her life. A chance encounter quickly spiraled her life out of control. She was stuck between a rock and a hard spot. As her life continued to be fraught with tough decisions at every turn, she soon became no stranger to conflict and strife.As the CEO of McNamara Holdings, Chase had one thing on his mind, keeping his family’s company afloat. Until he'd seen Cassidy and the stakes were quickly raised. Finding out she was off the market, he knew giving into temptation would only bring him temporary satisfaction. Then again, some things are just out of your control.Caught up in a whirlwind of life changing dilemmas, is there a rainbow ending anywhere in sight? Or is it all about the chase?*This book is for adults 18 and up*Mature content and language
author: Kiara Delaney
